snippet: The Patriots’ Rob Ninkovich was taught at a young age to “always be around the football because that is where things happen.” He has mastered that lesson.
abstract: Profile of New England Patriots defensive end Rob Ninkovich, who is preparing with team to face Baltimore Ravens in AFC championship game; Ninkovich struggled in NFL before arriving in New England in 2009.
lead_paragraph: The Patriots’ Rob Ninkovich was taught at a young age to “always be around the football because that is where things happen.” He has mastered that lesson.

headline.seo: Patriots’ Ninkovich Makes Most of His Opportunity
headline.main: A Nose for the Ball and a Knack for the Big Plays
headline.print_headline: Patriot Has Nose For Ball and a Knack For the Big Play
